description: Sexy as hell and aggressive as fuck, Drake Jaden returns to NK with a vengeance. This time he's teamed up with Blake Daniels for a hot and heavy tag team match against one of NK's finest wrestlers, DJ, and his teammate Gianni Luca. Right from the start the action is relentless and it's more than some can handle. The match takes an unexpected twist and the resulting battle is one for the record books. The only thing more exciting than the explosive final round is the scorching sex round with huge, hard cocks pounding beautiful round bubble butts in victory... all in front of a screaming live audience. This is what Naked Kombat is all about!
title: Drake Jaden & Blake Daniels vs DJ & Gianni Luca
